get.summary: Debug endpoint to check all carts for current user
Get product recommendations for the current user based on their cart

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the current logged-in user

get.summary: Get product recommendations based on provided cart data (for external calls)

parameters.name: cartItemProductIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of product IDs in cart

parameters.name: cartItemProductNames
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of product names in cart

parameters.name: cartItemCategoryIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of category IDs in cart
